Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: Sure I can do that. Here's a 50-word summary paragraph of the posts:

Title: People are up in arms about the recent surge of illegal text message scams. But fear not the Albanese Government has heard our pleas and is taking action! They're setting up an SMS sender ID Registry to disrupt these scams once and for all. They've committed to tackling this issue as part of their 2023-24 Budget.
